Name: Wallpaper Web
About the game: allows you to get the system information and interaction of your local computer with your web wallpaper: open the local APP, get the volume of the computer, cpu usage...You will need to use the api provided by the software to make your own html web wallpaper! Use it together with other web wallpaper software!DLC will be updated in the future with standalone support for setting wallpapers. No UI, Automatic startup after startup, Mini memory footprint
